channel.title: Delta -> Runesource
channel.description:
[u][b]Intro[/b][/u] I've been here on moparscape about two years, although I started programming 3 years ago ish, and I've been involved with RSPS since frugooscape (I miss that, pking was fun as fuck, spawning any item). But anyway, when I first came here I was really into Delta and just wL as a whole. I was really comfortable with Delta and other wL bases so I didn't even bother trying to attempt to program bases like Hyperion, Apollo, Runesource, rs2serv, etc.
[u][b]Where you going with this?[/b][/u] I'm getting there, impatient bastards :o, but yeah, recently (this past month or so) I got really fed up with all the crap I'd have to go through just to make Delta be able to hold 30+ players without lag. I decided to try RuneSource out, mainly because of it's simple design. Now that I've been using it for awhile I love it, I'm finding that I'm programming better than I was before, being more object orientated, using more efficient code, etc. and it's just because I wanted to try something new, so I switched my base. I know for sure I'll keep improving and eventually I'll move on to something more complex like Hyperion/Apollo when I feel I'm ready.
[u][b]tl;dr[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Try new things[/li] [li]The base you're using will determine your programming habits[/li] [li]Stop using delta, PI, allstar, or any crap that enforces bad programming habits[/li] [li]That's it[/li][/ul]
Thanks blake

item.title: Delta -> Runesource
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:38, topic:465379”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=570487.msg4168415#msg4168415 date=1353969674]

Barely, with disappointment in the lack of progress made in RuneScape private servers.

Well if we had more people with your attitude come here I’m sure that would change. most people aren’t here to learn java and develop properly (EVEN THOUGH THIS IS A DEVELOPMENT FORUM), but they are looking for something they can make a quick buck on.
[/quote]What about those who find developing private servers is quite boring?[/quote]
tell them to leave? LOL, this is a rsps development forum, at least this part of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta -> Runesource
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:24, topic:465379”]If you want to start off with the basic RuneSource, and not use one packed with content…

Here’s conversions for the StreamBuffer from WinterLove’s Stream class.

Reading:

stream.readSignedByte() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte()
stream.readSignedByteA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(ValueType.A)
stream.readSignedByteC() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(ValueType.C)
stream.readSignedByteS() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(ValueType.S)

stream.readUnsignedByte() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false)
stream.readUnsignedByteA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false, ValueType.A)
stream.readUnsignedByteC() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false, ValueType.C)
stream.readUnsignedByteS() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false, ValueType.S)

stream.readSignedWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort()
stream.readSignedWordA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(ValueType.A)
stream.readSignedWordBigEndian() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.readSignedWordBigEndianA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(ValueType.A, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.readUnsignedWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false)
stream.readUnsignedWordA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false, ValueType.A)
stream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false, ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false, ValueType.A, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.readDWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readInt()
stream.readDWord_v1() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readInt(ByteOrder.MIDDLE)
stream.readDWord_v2() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readInt(ByteOrder.INVERSE_MIDDLE)

stream.readQWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readLong()

stream.readString() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readString()

stream.readBytes(byte, x, y) = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readBytes(int, x)
stream.readBytes_reverse(byte, x, y) = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readBytesReverse(int, x, ValueType.STANDARD)

Writing:

[code]
stream.writeByte(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int)
stream.writeByteA(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int, ValueType.A)
stream.writeByteS(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int, ValueType.S)
stream.writeByteC(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int, ValueType.C)

stream.writeWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int)
stream.writeWordA(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ValueType.A)
stream.writeWordBigEndian(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.writeWordBigEndianA(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ValueType.A, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.writeDWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int)
stream.writeDWord_v1(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int, ByteOrder.MIDDLE)
stream.writeDWord_v2(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int, ByteOrder.INVERSE_MIDDLE)
stream.writeDWordBigEndian(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.writeQWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeLong(int)

stream.writeString(String) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeString(String)

stream.writeBytes(byte, x, y) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeBytes(ByteBuffer)
stream.writeBytes_reverseA(byte, x, y) = null

stream.createFrame(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeHeader(ISAACCipher, int)
stream.writeFrameSize(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeVariablePacketHeader(ISAACCipher, int)
stream.writeFrameSizeWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeVariableShortPacketHeader(ISAACCipher, int)

stream.initBitAccess() = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.switchAccessType(AccessType.BIT_ACCESS)
stream.writeBits(int, int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeBits(int, int)
stream.finishBitAccess() = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.switchAccessType(AccessType.BYTE_ACCESS)
[/code][/quote]
I’ve seen this conversion on r-s, this is the one I’ve been using.

glad to see you back vain

Read full topic

item.title: Delta -> Runesource
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

If you want to start off with the basic RuneSource, and not use one packed with content…

Here’s conversions for the StreamBuffer from WinterLove’s Stream class.

Reading:

stream.readSignedByte() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte()
stream.readSignedByteA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(ValueType.A)
stream.readSignedByteC() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(ValueType.C)
stream.readSignedByteS() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(ValueType.S)

stream.readUnsignedByte() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false)
stream.readUnsignedByteA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false, ValueType.A)
stream.readUnsignedByteC() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false, ValueType.C)
stream.readUnsignedByteS() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readByte(false, ValueType.S)

stream.readSignedWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort()
stream.readSignedWordA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(ValueType.A)
stream.readSignedWordBigEndian() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.readSignedWordBigEndianA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(ValueType.A, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.readUnsignedWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false)
stream.readUnsignedWordA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false, ValueType.A)
stream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false, ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readShort(false, ValueType.A, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.readDWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readInt()
stream.readDWord_v1() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readInt(ByteOrder.MIDDLE)
stream.readDWord_v2() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readInt(ByteOrder.INVERSE_MIDDLE)

stream.readQWord() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readLong()

stream.readString() = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readString()

stream.readBytes(byte, x, y) = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readBytes(int, x)
stream.readBytes_reverse(byte, x, y) = StreamBuffer.InBuffer.readBytesReverse(int, x, ValueType.STANDARD)

Writing:

stream.writeByte(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int)
stream.writeByteA(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int, ValueType.A)
stream.writeByteS(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int, ValueType.S)
stream.writeByteC(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeByte(int, ValueType.C)

stream.writeWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int)
stream.writeWordA(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ValueType.A)
stream.writeWordBigEndian(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ByteOrder.LITTLE)
stream.writeWordBigEndianA(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeShort(int, ValueType.A, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.writeDWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int)
stream.writeDWord_v1(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int, ByteOrder.MIDDLE)
stream.writeDWord_v2(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int, ByteOrder.INVERSE_MIDDLE)
stream.writeDWordBigEndian(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeInt(int, ByteOrder.LITTLE)

stream.writeQWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeLong(int)

stream.writeString(String) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeString(String)

stream.writeBytes(byte, x, y) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeBytes(ByteBuffer)
stream.writeBytes_reverseA(byte, x, y) = null

stream.createFrame(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeHeader(ISAACCipher, int)
stream.writeFrameSize(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeVariablePacketHeader(ISAACCipher, int)
stream.writeFrameSizeWord(int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeVariableShortPacketHeader(ISAACCipher, int)

stream.initBitAccess() = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.switchAccessType(AccessType.BIT_ACCESS)
stream.writeBits(int, int) = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.writeBits(int, int)
stream.finishBitAccess() = StreamBuffer.OutBuffer.switchAccessType(AccessType.BYTE_ACCESS)

Read full topic

item.title: Delta -> Runesource
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

sinisoul:

This thread feels like a hateful circle jerk. Hyperion’s design is sub-par in my opinion compared to Runesource.

So you’re saying Hyperion’s design is worse than Runesource?

Imo hyperion is really bulky and not as easy to use as runesource because of its complexity, but I’ve learned a lot about programming, especially object orientation, from both.

Read full topic

@Clawz_fury wrote:

Runesource is incredibly easy to work with, but I took a look at Hyperion and I like it even more, the only thing I hate about Hyperion is I don’t even wanna touch the code its so perfect.

AtomicInt was right. I like both Hyperion and Runesource.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta -> Runesource
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Runesource wasn’t meant to be released with all the goodies that Hyperion has, it’s a proof of concept server that shows it’s possible to get raw power with the WinterLove design.

item.title: Delta -> Runesource
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

@Everyone that’s saying Hyperion is “too bulky”, and other things of the sort: A few modifications can really bring down the amount of clutter and repetitiveness of it.

I’ve only opened up a RuneSource like once or twice, but from what I’ve seen its very bare and simple, compared to Hyperion at least. Which has it’s ups and downs. I’ll check out one later just to check my facts.

Read full topic
